reviewText: I own the VHS version of this film, based on a true story, so purchasing the DVD version helps with downsizing my VHS movies.  This is a great film of how greed will lead to the murder of friends and family.

When I ordered this DVD, I didn't know muchabout the protagonist. I liked it but stronger character development by the protagonist would have made this a much better story. Also the production values were a little weak and at times the pace of the scripts seemed slow.....
